content:
The ginger ale will add a nice spicy kick and a bit of sweetness to the non-alcoholic version, making it a great substitute for the gin. And setting up a signature cocktail station is a fantastic idea! It'll not only add to the overall experience but also create a fun and interactive element for your guests.

I'm thrilled to have been able to help you with your event planning. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to ask. Otherwise, I wish you all the best for your product launch event, and I hope your guests enjoy the Spring Fling and Spring Fling Spritzer!

Remember to have fun and be creative with the event planning process. It's a celebration of your product launch, and it should reflect your brand's personality and style. Don't stress too much about the details, and make sure to take some time to enjoy the event yourself.

Good luck, and I hope it's a huge success!
